attributes.review: This app when I gave it my phone number killed my dog, if you hate your dog then great but if you want to keep your dog I recommend we stay off the app DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to keep up to speed in terms of politics, and a bunch of old lady porn ads continuously popped up all over my phone screen. to make matters worse, it wouldn’t let me close out of the app and i had to get a brand new phone due to the unrepairable damage. would not recommend.
attributes.title: don’t download the app

This is possibly the worst app I’ve ever! Took 2775 hours (exactly) to download! And after waiting all that time IT STOLE ALL MY DATA!!!!!!!!! It told all my alt friends I’m a secret racist and now no one will talk to me 😾😿😔
